Name: Sir Tom Winsor
Job/Team Function: "HM Chief Inspector Of Constabulary has responsibility for all of HMIC's activities. HM Chief Inspector is Chair of the HMIC Board."
Notes: Post previously coded 1HMIC01, team too small for detail, costs included in 1HMIC01

Name: Mike Cunningham
Job Title: HM Inspector of Constabulary Northern Region
Job/Team Function: "HMI Northern has responsibility for police forces in the north of England. HMI Northern is Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's value for money programme and is a HMIC Board member."

Name: Zoe Billingham
Job Title: HM Inspector of Constabulary Eastern Region
Job/Team Function: "HMI Eastern has responsibility for police forces in the east of England. HMI Eastern is Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's police authority inspection programme and is a HMIC Board member."

Name: Stephen Otter
Job/Team Function: "HMI National has responsibility for the Metropolitan Police Service, the Police Service of Northern Ireland, the City of London Police, the British Transport Police, SOCA, HMRC, Ministry of Defence Police, Civil Nuclear Constabulary, Jersey, Guernsey, Cyprus and the Royal Gibraltar Police.  HMI National is also the HMIC's Senior Responsible Owner for Counter Terrorism, Protection from Serious Harm, the Olympic Games (2012), and is a HMIC Board member."

Name: Drusilla Sharpling
Job Title: HM Inspector of Constabulary Western Region
Job/Team Function: "HMI Western has responsibility for police forces in the west of England and in Wales. HMI Western is also Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's criminal justice programme plus its work on rape and is a HMIC Board member."

This includes developing and implementing HMIC's operating model and running HMIC's inspection support services. He is also HMIC's Senior Responsible Owner for the evolution of the Police Report Card and is a HMIC Board member."
